txt.en: The burrows of Klórgren can be found on the eastern edges of Elderslade.\n\nYou should burn the stone-claw corpses within Klórgren.
The burrows of Klórgren can be found on the eastern edges of Elderslade.\n\nYou should burn the stone-claw corpses within Klórgren.

Klórgren, the massive network of stone-claw tunnels and burrows, cracks the earth as the passages inside weave and twist through the hills. Within Klórgren, the stone-claws are frenzied and disease-ridden. Dead stone-claws line the tunnels ahead. If the corpses are not removed from Klórgren, it is possible that the rock slides will increase and the stone-claws will become even more frenzied as the disease spreads.
Burn the stone-claw corpses within Klórgren
Burn many stone-claw corpses within Klórgren.
The burrows of Klórgren are the cause of unstable earth in the eastern edges of Elderslade.

You have successfully burned many of the diseased stone-claw corpses found in Klórgren. The dwarves coming to Elderslade will thank you for your efforts. This disease that the stone-claws struggle with is not natural, however. You wonder what else in Elderslade has been affected and defiled by the forces of Gundabad, and to what purpose.
Burn the stone-claw corpses within Klórgren ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
